targets.query: SELECT mean("cpucore") FROM "load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("min1") FROM "load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("min5") FROM "load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("min15") FROM "load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("total") FROM "processcount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("user") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("system") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("eth0.rx") FROM "network" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("eth0.tx") FROM "network" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "memswap" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "memswap" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("vda.read_bytes") FROM "diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("vda.write_bytes") FROM "diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("vdb.read_bytes") FROM "diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("vdb.write_bytes") FROM "diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("/.used") FROM "fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("/.size") FROM "fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("/.percent") FROM "fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("/boot/efi.percent") FROM "localhost.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("influxsrv.cpu_percent") FROM "docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("influxsrv.memory_usage") FROM "docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("glances.cpu_percent") FROM "docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("glances.memory_usage") FROM "docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("user") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("user") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("user") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("system") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("system") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("system") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("time_since_update") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("time_since_update") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

list.name: container
list.query: show field keys on glances from "$host.docker"

list.name: interface
list.query: show field keys on glances from "$host.network"

list.name: disk
list.query: show field keys on glances from "$host.diskio"
